Class Dealer

java.lang.Object
Dealer
public class Dealer extends Object
Represents the dealer in the Blackjack game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Dealer()
    Constructs a new dealer with an empty hand.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void

    Adds a card to the dealer's hand.

    Calculates the total value of the dealer's hand.
    void
    clearHand()
    Clears the dealer's hand.
    void
    dealerPlays()
    Simulates the dealer's turn in the game.
    boolean
    isBlackJack()
    Checks if the dealer has a Blackjack.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dealer

      public Dealer()
      Constructs a new dealer with an empty hand.

  • Method Details

    • isBlackJack

      public boolean isBlackJack()
      Checks if the dealer has a Blackjack.
      Returns:
      true if the dealer has a Blackjack, false otherwise.

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the dealer's hand.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be added to the hand.

    • calculateHand

      public int calculateHand()
      Calculates the total value of the dealer's hand.
      Returns:
      The total value of the hand.

    • clearHand

      public void clearHand()
      Clears the dealer's hand.

    • dealerPlays

      public void dealerPlays()
      Simulates the dealer's turn in the game. The dealer hits until their hand total is 17 or higher.
